bug.author: Code4SAFrankie
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Added the multiselect example to my code. This gave an error. When I tried to change the config.toml to see where it errors it hanged the console. Can't exit with CTRL-C anymore. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Add the multiselect example code to your script: <denchmark-code>options = st.multiselect( 'What are your favorite colors', ('Yellow', 'Red') ('Green', 'Yellow', 'Red', 'Blue')) st.write('You selected:', options) </denchmark-code>
In config.toml set: sharingMode = "off" installTracer = true liveSave = true runOnSave = true port = 8502 serverPort = 8502 <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
Serve the app with a multiselect <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
Console hangs and can't exit with CTRL-C. Browser gives no data found. Console shows this error: Exception in callback functools.partial(<function wrap..null_wrapper at 0x0000014AFCC14D90>, <Future finished exception=AssertionError('Sharing is disabled. See "global.sharingMode".')>) Traceback (most recent call last): File "e:\wpy-3710\python-3.7.1.amd64\lib\site-packages\tornado\ioloop.py", line 758, in _run_callback ret = callback() File "e:\wpy-3710\python-3.7.1.amd64\lib\site-packages\tornado\stack_context.py", line 300, in null_wrapper return fn(*args, **kwargs) File "e:\wpy-3710\python-3.7.1.amd64\lib\site-packages\tornado\ioloop.py", line 779, in _discard_future_result future.result() File "e:\wpy-3710\python-3.7.1.amd64\lib\site-packages\tornado\gen.py", line 326, in wrapper yielded = next(result) File "e:\wpy-3710\python-3.7.1.amd64\lib\site-packages\streamlit\ReportSession.py", line 545, in _save_running_report url = yield self._get_storage().save_report_files(self._report.report_id, files) File "e:\wpy-3710\python-3.7.1.amd64\lib\site-packages\streamlit\ReportSession.py", line 571, in _get_storage self._storage = Storage() File "e:\wpy-3710\python-3.7.1.amd64\lib\site-packages\streamlit\storage\S3Storage.py", line 59, in init ), 'Sharing is disabled. See "global.sharingMode".' AssertionError: Sharing is disabled. See "global.sharingMode". <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
That is, did this use to work the way you expected in the past? yes <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.47.2 Python version: 3.7.1 Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? pip on WinPython OS version: Windows 10 version 1903 Browser version: Firefox 69.0 <denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
Running with: E:\WPy-3710\python-3.7.1.amd64\Scripts>.\streamlit run e:\work\python\uber_pickups.py

comments.comment: I think there is a missing comma after the first tuple in the multiselect example.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Code4SAFrankie>@Code4SAFrankie</denchmark-link> . In this case, the problem is caused by the: <denchmark-code>liveSave = true </denchmark-code>
option in your config file. We apologize, but was temporarily disabled for launch. It should be re-enabled when <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/issues/228>#228</denchmark-link> is fixed and merged. Please follow that bug for up-to-date information. Best! Adrien
